cafes.name: Dyu Art Cafe
cafes.description: A charming Kerala-style cafe with an open courtyard and mini art gallery. Perfect for coffee lovers and art enthusiasts in a serene setting.
cafes.address: Dyu Art Cafe, No 23, KHB MIG Colony, Koramangala 8th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095

cafes.name: Justbe Cafe
cafes.description: India’s first whole-food plant-based cafe, offering healthy, chemical-free dishes in a peaceful environment ideal for families and solo diners.

cafes.name: Trippy Goat Cafe
cafes.description: Located in a grand old bungalow with alfresco seating, this cozy spot on Cunningham Road offers hearty meals in a calm, airy setting.

cafes.name: Matteo Coffea
cafes.description: A paradise for coffee lovers with a variety of brews, ranging from classic cappuccinos to traditional filter coffee, all in an elegant setting.

cafes.name: Om Made Cafe
cafes.description: Eco-friendly rooftop cafe offering organic dishes with city views. A sustainable dining choice with live music on weekends.

cafes.name: The White Room Coffee & Kitchen
cafes.description: British-style ambiance inside High Gates Hotel, with pristine white decor and a colonial feel, ideal for a classic coffee experience.

cafes.name: Champaca Cafe
cafes.description: A peaceful bookstore cafe surrounded by greenery, perfect for quiet escapes with a book or light snack, with a serene, earthy vibe.

cafes.name: Brik Oven
cafes.description: A lively spot on Church Street known for cheesy loaded pizzas and a cozy vibe, perfect for pizza lovers and casual hangouts.

cafes.name: Marzipan Cafe and Bakery
cafes.description: Cozy Mediterranean-themed cafe with rustic interiors offering authentic dishes and a warm ambiance.

cafes.name: Lazy Suzy
cafes.description: Known for its all-day breakfast and desserts, this cafe offers a relaxing retreat from the busy city streets with prompt service.

restaurants.name: Karavalli
restaurants.description: Known for its coastal Indian cuisine, Karavalli offers seafood lovers an authentic experience with dishes like tiger prawn roast and flavorful fish curry.

restaurants.name: EDO at ITC Gardenia
restaurants.description: This fine dining spot provides a Japanese culinary journey with sushi, sashimi, and tempura in an elegant setting perfect for special occasions.

restaurants.name: Alba
restaurants.description: An Italian gem at JW Marriott, Alba specializes in classic Italian dishes with a modern twist, accompanied by a fine selection of wines.

restaurants.name: Toit
restaurants.description: A beloved brewery in Indiranagar, Toit serves freshly brewed beer and a diverse menu of pizzas and continental snacks, perfect for a lively night out.

restaurants.name: Nagarjuna
restaurants.description: Celebrated for its spicy Andhra cuisine, Nagarjuna’s biryanis and thalis are a must-try for fans of South Indian flavors.

restaurants.name: Cubbon Pavilion
restaurants.description: Known for its extensive global menu, Cubbon Pavilion is a top choice for those seeking a variety of international and healthy dining options.

restaurants.name: Windmill Craftworks
restaurants.description: Combining craft beer, live jazz, and a library ambiance, this artsy spot in Whitefield is perfect for a unique dining and music experience.

restaurants.name: The Black Pearl
restaurants.description: A pirate-themed restaurant with nautical decor, offering seafood and meat platters that transport diners into a high-seas adventure.

restaurants.name: Truffles
restaurants.description: Popular for its hearty burgers and steaks, Truffles is a budget-friendly restaurant that doesn’t compromise on quality.

restaurants.name: Gufha at The President Hotel
restaurants.description: A unique cave-themed restaurant that immerses diners in a prehistoric ambiance with a range of tribal and Indian-inspired dishes.
